Приветствую!\nКак думаешь, ученики нашего секты {0} бессовестные? Ха-ха, не жалей меня и не жалей Одинокое Облако, ведь я и сам так думаю! Поддерживать друг друга легко, но забыть друг друга в цзянху не так просто. Однако я установил это правило секты, чтобы предостеречь учеников Одинокого Облака. Если есть время, встреться с ними. Если держишь обиды, плюну вместе с тобой. Равнодушен — тоже нет беды помочь хорошей паре.

1. Игрок обязуется не трансляровать Игру на любых стриминговых платформах.

2. Игрок обязуется не раскрывать любую Конфиденциальную Информацию через любые публичные каналы, включая, но не ограничиваясь, внутриигровыми скриншотами, игровым контентом или любой иной информацией, связанной с Игрой или её тестированием.

3. Игрок обязуется не писать, публиковать, участвовать или отвечать на любые статьи, комментарии, контент или обсуждения, касающиеся Игры или её тестирования, в любых публичных каналах.

4. Игрок обязуется не раскрывать, обсуждать или разглашать любую Конфиденциальную Информацию, связанную с Игрой или её тестированием, третьим лицам в любой форме.

Любое действие Игрока, нарушающее вышеуказанные обязательства, в том числе раскрытие Конфиденциальной Информации, считается нарушением независимо от степени. При возникновении прямых или косвенных убытков у оператора Игры или связанных компаний, Игрок добровольно несёт соответствующую экономическую ответственность за компенсацию. При возникновении спора, связанного с исполнением настоящего Соглашения о неразглашении, Игрок соглашается на исключительную подсудность Народного суда района Тяньхэ, г. Гуанчжоу.
Настоящее обязательство действует с момента входа Игрока в Игру и действительно до тех пор, пока Конфиденциальная Информация не станет публичной.

function CommonBranchSelectWindow:destroy_object()
	local w = G.ui_manager:get_window_by_name("NpcTalkOptionsWindow")
	if w then
		w:pop_visible_flag("CommonBranchSelectWindow")
		w:on_reenter()
	end
	CommonBranchSelectWindow.super.destroy_object(self)
end

local CommonBranchSelectController = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.common.common_branch_select_window").CommonBranchSelectController

function CommonBranchSelectController:init(kwargs)
	kwargs = kwargs or dict()
	CommonBranchSelectController.super.init(self, kwargs)
	self.view:play_anim("vx_in")
	self:register_listener()
	--self:refresh_view(kwargs)
	-- 打开侠名值界面
	self.view.template_xiaming_btn_view:get_node("button_icon"):set_onClick(function(_) self:_open_xiaming_main_widnow() end)

	if G.main_player then
		local target_id = G.main_player:branch_select_get_interact_target_id()
		if target_id then
			local target = G.space:get_entity(target_id)
			if target then
				self.target_id = target_id
				target:try_push_interacting_flag(interact_component_consts.NPC_INTERACTING_FLAG_BRANCH_SELECT, true)
			end
		end
	end
	self:push_mouse_visible()
end

function CommonBranchSelectController:push_mouse_visible()
	if G.setting_manager:get_setting("play_mode") == consts.PLAY_MODE_DONGZUO then
		G.mouse_manager:push_show_mouse("branch_select", true, mouse_consts.SHOW_MOUSE_BRANCH_DIALOG)
	end
end

function CommonBranchSelectController:pop_mouse_visible()
	G.mouse_manager:pop_show_mouse("branch_select")
end

function CommonBranchSelectController:set_view_visible(is_visible)
	self.view:set_visible(is_visible)
	if self.relate_window then
		if not is_visible then
			self.relate_window:push_visible_flag(false, "CommonBranchSelectWindow")
		else
			self.relate_window:pop_visible_flag("CommonBranchSelectWindow")
		end
	end
	if is_visible then
		self:push_mouse_visible()
	else
		self:pop_mouse_visible()
	end

end

function CommonBranchSelectController:refresh_view(kwargs)
	self.view:play_anim("vx_in")
	self:set_view_visible(true)
	self.choose_callback = kwargs:get("choose_callback")
	self.branch_no = G.main_player:branch_select_get_branch_no()
	self.branch_sys_d = G.datam.branch_data:get(self.branch_no, dict())
	self:use_selection_manager()
	self:set_template_adapter(function(data) return self:template_adapter(data) end)
	self:refresh_content()

	self:remove_timer("goto_timer")
	self:add_timer(function() self:handle_goto_func() end, 0.01, 0, 0, 0.01, "goto_timer")
end

function CommonBranchSelectController:get_list_view()
	return self.view.listview_branches
end

function CommonBranchSelectController:on_listen_click_choice(event, data)
	-- G.logger:info("mh", "[common_branch_select_controller] on_listen_click_choice data:%s", data)
	self.curr_select_option = data:get("option_no")
	local is_waiting_for_end = data:get("is_waiting_for_end")
	if is_waiting_for_end then
		local expand_id = self.branch_sys_d:get(string.format("expand_id_%d", self.curr_select_option))
		G.net:call_server("rpc_branch_select_consume_token_stuff", expand_id)
	else
		-- 效果不太对
		--self.view:play_anim("vx_out", nil, function() self:handle_choose_callback() end)
		self:handle_choose_callback()
	end
end

function CommonBranchSelectController:destroy_object()
	if self.target_id then
		local target = G.space:get_entity(self.target_id)
		if target then
			target:try_pop_interact_flag(interact_component_consts.NPC_INTERACTING_FLAG_BRANCH_SELECT)
		end
	end
	self:close_relate_window()
	self:pop_mouse_visible()
	CommonBranchSelectController.super.destroy_object(self)
end

local NpcDialogsHomeSubTitleController = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.npc.npc_dialogs.npc_dialog_home_subtitle_window").NpcDialogsHomeSubTitleController

function NpcDialogsHomeSubTitleController:init(kwargs)
	NpcDialogsHomeSubTitleController.super.init(self, kwargs)
	self:add_touch()
	self.image_bg = self.view:get_node("imageview_bottom_jianbian")
	self.text_node = self.view:get_node("text_subtitle")
	self.original_text_color = self.text_node:get_color()
	self.button_zimu = self.view:get_node("button_1")
	self.skip_button = self.view:get_node("widget_zimu_bottom")

	self.button_zimu:set_touch_enabled(true)
	self.button_zimu:add_click_event_listener(function(...) return self:on_touch_ended(...) end)
	self.skip_button_timer = nil

	self.action_play_mode = G.setting_manager:get_setting("play_mode")

	if G.main_player then
		G.main_player.in_no_move_dialog = true
	end

	G.gui_dispatcher:dispatch(event_consts.E_UI_HIDE_MODE, dict(action = "push", flag = "dialog_hide", mode = 17))
	G.gui_dispatcher:dispatch(event_consts.E_DIALOG_NO_MOVE_UI_PLAY, dict(visible = false, reason="dialog"))
	G.input_manager:activate_input_env_by_config(dialog_consts.CUTSCENE_INPUT_ENV_ID)
	if self.action_play_mode == consts.PLAY_MODE_DONGZUO then
		G.mouse_manager:push_show_mouse("cutscene_dialog", false, mouse_consts.SHOW_MOUSE_CUTSCENE_DIALOG)
	end
end

function NpcDialogsHomeSubTitleController:destroy_object()
	if G.main_player then
		G.main_player.in_no_move_dialog = false
	end
	if self._timeline then
		self._timeline:pop_cancel_synchronize()
	end
	self:clear_all_timer()
	G.gui_dispatcher:dispatch(event_consts.E_UI_HIDE_MODE, dict(action = "pop", flag = "dialog_hide"))
	G.gui_dispatcher:dispatch(event_consts.E_DIALOG_NO_MOVE_UI_PLAY, dict(visible = true, reason="dialog"))
	G.input_manager:deactivate_input_env_by_config(dialog_consts.CUTSCENE_INPUT_ENV_ID)
	G.ui_manager:add_touch_intercept_mask("dialog", 0.5) --关闭时增加一个不可点击的屏幕
	G.mouse_manager:pop_show_mouse("cutscene_dialog")
	NpcDialogsHomeSubTitleController.super.destroy_object(self)
end

local TalkOptionItemController = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.npc.npc_interact.npc_talk_options_window").TalkOptionItemController
function TalkOptionItemController:on_click(_)
	local function play_vx_task_click_cb()
		self.view:play_anim("vx_task_normal_into")
		local callback = self.data:get_callback()
		if callback and callable(callback) then
			callback(self)
		end
	end
	self.view:play_anim("vx_task_click", false, play_vx_task_click_cb)
end

local NpcTalkOptionsWindow = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.npc.npc_interact.npc_talk_options_window").NpcTalkOptionsWindow
local NpcTalkOptionsController = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.npc.npc_interact.npc_talk_options_window").NpcTalkOptionsController
local TalkOptionsListViewController = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.npc.npc_interact.npc_talk_options_window").TalkOptionsListViewController
local NpcTalkOptionsModel = require("hexm.client.ui.windows.npc.npc_interact.npc_talk_options_window").NpcTalkOptionsModel

function NpcTalkOptionsController:push_mouse_visible()
	if G.setting_manager:get_setting("play_mode") == consts.PLAY_MODE_DONGZUO then
		G.mouse_manager:push_show_mouse("talk_option", true, mouse_consts.SHOW_MOUSE_BRANCH_DIALOG)
	end
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:pop_mouse_visible()
	G.mouse_manager:pop_show_mouse("talk_option")
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:destroy_object()
	self:pop_mouse_visible()
	if self.model_options then
		self.model_options:destroy_object()
	end
	self:leave_camera()
	if self.target_id then
		local target_entity = G.space:get_entity(self.target_id)
		if target_entity then
			if target_entity.fake_server then
				target_entity.fake_server.dispatcher:dispatch(event_consts.E_TALK_CHOOSE_UI_CLOSE, dict())
			else
				target_entity:call_server_entity_method("rpc_send_event_to_npc_ai", "E_TALK_CHOOSE_UI_CLOSE", dict())
			end
			target_entity:try_pop_interact_flag(interact_component_consts.NPC_INTERACTING_FLAG_TALK_OPTIONS)
		end
	end

	G.mouse_manager:pop_show_mouse("talk_option")
	NpcTalkOptionsController.super.destroy_object(self)
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:init(kwargs)
	kwargs = kwargs or dict()
	NpcTalkOptionsController.super.init(self, kwargs)
	self:on_enter()
	self.view.template_btn_info_2_view:set_visible(false)
	self.listview_options = self:create_child(TalkOptionsListViewController, self.view:get_node("listview_1"))
	self.target_id = kwargs:get("entity_id")
	if self.target_id then
		local target = G.space:get_entity(self.target_id)
		if target then
			target:try_push_interacting_flag(interact_component_consts.NPC_INTERACTING_FLAG_TALK_OPTIONS, true)
		end
	end
	local extra_data = kwargs:get("extra_data", dict())
	if kwargs:get("model_options") then
		self.model_options = kwargs:get("model_options")
	else
		self.model_options = NpcTalkOptionsModel(G.main_player_id, kwargs:get("entity_id"), extra_data)
	end
	self.listview_options:set_model(self.model_options)
	self:_add_dispatcher(G.gui_dispatcher, event_consts.E_LEAVE_INTERACT_AREA_TOTALLY, function(e, d) self:on_leave_interact_area(e, d) end)
	self:_add_dispatcher(G.gui_dispatcher, event_consts.E_DIALOG_NO_MOVE_UI_PLAY, function(e,d) self:on_reenter(e, d) end)
	self:init_sys_d()
	self:enter_camera()
	self:play_enter_dialog()
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:on_enter()
	self.view:play_anim("vx_in")
	self:push_mouse_visible()
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:on_reenter(event, data)
	self:on_enter()
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:play_enter_dialog()
	self:pop_mouse_visible()
	local dialog_no = self.options_sys_d:get("dialog_id")
	if not bool(dialog_no) then
		dialog_no = G.datam.npc_talk_option_default_params[1]:get("default_xianhua")
	end

	if type(dialog_no) == "list" then
		local idx = math.random(#dialog_no)
		dialog_no = dialog_no[idx]
	end

	if G.space then
		G.space:start_dialogs(dialog_no, dict(
			target_id=self.target_id, stop_callback= function(finished) return self:on_enter_dialog_stop(finished) end
		))
	end
end

function NpcTalkOptionsController:on_enter_dialog_stop(finished)
	-- G.logger:info("lk", "==================== on_enter_dialog_stop: %s", finished)
	if self:is_destroyed() then
		return
	end

	if bool(self.model_options:get_only_exit_option()) then
		self.window:close() -- 需要立刻退出，因为正常退出有淡出动效
		--self.window:start_close()
		return
	end
	if #self.listview_options:get_items() <= 1 then
		-- 可能有其他选项，但是都被隐藏了，只有离开，那么也要立即退出
		self.window:close()
	end
	self:push_mouse_visible()
end

function NpcTalkOptionsWindow:on_reenter()
	self.controller:on_reenter()
end

Создание комнаты:
Создайте свою собственную комнату Тренировочной террасы и станьте хозяином. Вы сможете управлять участниками, организовывать дуэли или назначить нового ведущего. Если вы покинете комнату, самым популярным станет новый ведущий.

Правила матча:
Ведущий может выбрать один из двух режимов: свободный или управляемый.
Свободный режим: участники могут вызывать любого из присутствующих (команд).
Управляемый режим: игроки/капитаны записываются, а ведущий выбирает, кто сразится.
Счёт матча можно установить «до 1», «до 3» или «до 5».
Поддерживаются форматы 1х1, 2х2, 3х3, 5х5.

Ранние признаки: головная боль, лёгкая лихорадка, усталость, потеря аппетита. Даже после затянувшейся раны могут беспокоить боль, онемение, покалывание в месте укуса. Через 2–3 дня возможны беспокойство, раздражительность, страх воды, ветра или света: одно их присутствие вызывает судороги гортани или всего тела. На последней стадии человек обычно становится спокоен, спазмы проходят, но появляются паралич, слабость, заторможенность рефлексов, расширенные зрачки, проблемы с дыханием и сердцем. Этот этап крайне опасен — всё часто заканчивается летальным исходом из-за дыхательной недостаточности на 8-й день.

«С того момента, как Хуяо захватил монастырь Милосердного Сердца, он сдружился со всяким сбродом. Эти люди стали “монахами” лишь по виду — на деле они были разбойниками и называли себя “аскетами”. Особенно выделялся среди них Хуймяо: был бабником и даже носил прозвище “Яб-Ям”. Четвёртый по старшинству, охраняет монастырь Цветущей Вуали. Он и его люди похищали из близлежащих деревень молодых девушек... Недавно пропала ещё одна группа. Говорят, в храме Хуймяо убеждает их заняться с ним “постижением Будды” — очевидно, с дурными намерениями. Пора спасти невинных! Если вы не в бою, пройдите через главные ворота как #Yучёный#E и попробуйте уговорить Хуймяо отступить словом и красноречием. #Y(Рекомендуемый Мастерство учёного: 1500)#E»

«Для защиты несовершеннолетних в Сети эта игра не рекомендуется лицам младше 18 лет.\nСоветы по здоровому геймингу: противостойте вредным играм, отвергайте пиратство. Берегите себя, остерегайтесь мошенничества. Умеренный досуг полезен для ума, зависимость вредит телу. Распределяйте время с умом, живите здорово.\nПо предписанию Управления прессы и публикаций КНР “О предотвращении игровой зависимости среди несовершеннолетних” и “О дополнительном ужесточении контроля над игровой зависимостью несовершеннолетних”, все игроки должны зарегистрироваться по настоящему удостоверению личности.»

Премиум-награды Боевого пропуска, купленного на $T(9001), #Yможно получить только на $T(9001)#E.
Боевой/Премиальный боевой пропуск, купленный на $T(9001), даёт призы за повышение уровня только на $T(9001). На других платформах они видны, но не доступны к получению.
Боевой/Премиальный пропуск, купленный на прочих платформах, даёт призы за уровень только там. На $T(9001) они отображаются, но не получаются.
Если купить боевой пропуск Элитный на $T(9001) и Премиальный на другой платформе (или наоборот), тогда призы можно получить на обеих платформах.

After the Huichang Persecution, Liaowu dreamt beneath the Bodhi Tree of Sins and saw visions of a world in ruin. He awoke in tears. When his disciples asked him, he replied: "The Three Realms are a house aflame, suffering bears down on all. Even the mercy of the Buddha cannot quench the fire. The stains of sentient beings run deep—this is what I have seen." Thus he made a vow to save the world and founded the Path of Rebirth:\nMay cultivators of this path cast off their bodies into the depths of Naraka, shouldering the heavy burden of karma alone—delivering the dreaming, and guiding the weak to bliss.

Dear Wanderer,

We have detected an issue affecting the material consumption during gear tuning. Due to this anomaly, an abnormal amount of materials and coins were consumed. Sixteen Lanes has since issued an emergency fix, and the affected items have now been refunded in full.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused during this period. As a token of our regret, we have prepared a #4d734dcompensation reward#E, a humble gesture of goodwill, with hopes you will continue to walk beside us on this journey.

Thank you for your understanding and continued support of Where Winds Meet.
If you have further questions or concerns, you may press <LINK id='link' color='#4d734d' url='https://s.163.com/7NkgjP' is_underline='true'> to visit our
Customer Support Center </LINK> to get assistance, or call our dedicated service line at 95163988.

Well, well, well! Bet you were born right at ugly o'clock! Judgin' by how you're talkin', I reckon you showed up bang on time!

Those three little rascals—Fu, Lu, and Shou—can't read or write, but they insisted on sending you a letter. So, this old man will be writing it for them. Whatever they said, I wrote, so don't mind the rambling.

Fu: Old Shan, write this: Big Guy, after we parted ways at the Furnace, we were all really worried about you.

Shou: Don't write that! I wasn't worried about that big dumb-dumb at all!

Fu: But you were! You were running in circles so fast, Fu-Fu's eyes got dizzy!

Shou: No, I wasn't! You remembered wrong, dummy Fu-Fu!

Lu: Stop arguing! Weren't we going to tell $T(2001) about the treasure? Old Shan, write this: we were worried, so we snuck back into the Furnace to find you. But turns out you're so strong, you'd already fought your way out! We picked up some treasures along the way. Since these are no use to us, we all agreed they should go to you.

Shou: I never said to give them to $T(30)!

Lu: Fine, fine! You didn't say this, it was me and Fu-Fu.

Shou: Then don't make it sound like just you two decided!

Fu: Oh! I understand! A'Shou's being… um… donkey lips and horse mouth?

Lu: Don't you mean saying one thing but meaning another?

Shou: Little Fu, did you just call me a donkey?!

Fu: I-I-I did not! Why would you think you're a donkey?!

...

Sigh. Now Little Fu and Little Shou are fighting, Little Lu's trying to break it up,
and this old man's head is spinning from the noise. Who knows when they'll stop.

Anyway, I won't wait on them anymore.
Wanderer, when you have time, come by the old man's "Sepulchral Curios" shop in the Ghost Market. You can pick up the treasures they brought back from the Buried Tomes.

This issue has now been resolved. Wanderers may once again engage in fluid combos and tactical exchanges within Arena Mode as before. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. To the Esteemed Youxia-er: 
In the chill of winter, we greet you. 
The splendid vistas of Jianghu pass swiftly, and before we knew it, Yanyun has journeyed with you through the depths of winter. Thanks to your unwavering support, even before spring arrives, we celebrate the milestone of #8c58231500 million Youxia-er#E joining our ranks. 
Since the Open Beta began, we have diligently heeded your feedback, striving to refine every corner of Jianghu and enhance the experience for all adventurers across platforms. Today's achievements are a testament to your support and patience. In gratitude, the Sixteen Lanes present you with a #4d734dToken of Appreciation#E. 
Your encouragement inspires us to greater heights. We will forever cherish how you and "Yanyun Sixteen Lanes" have shaped today's Jianghu. The road ahead is long, but Yanyun remains steadfast by your side, committed to preserving the legends of Jianghu for generations. 
As the New Year approaches, we wish you prosperity and joy. May we ride side by side through the boundless beauty of Jianghu, sharing its wonders year after year.

All vessels follow the flesh; all sinews follow the bones. The body contains 365 bones, bound and interwoven in structure. By them, the hands can grasp, the feet can walk—every motion flows from their alignment. But in sudden calamities—falls, crashes, violent twists—injuries may occur beyond prediction. In treatment, minor cases call for reducing swelling and easing spasms, while serious ones require reconnecting sinews and resetting bones. For each, there are time-tested prescriptions.

To the Esteemed Youxia-er:

As winter chills, we send our regards.

After several seasons, "Yanyun Sixteen Tones" finally meets you all. Thanks to your trust, Yanyun has welcomed #Y3 million wanderers#E. The once #Ygreenhorn#E now presents their answer sheet—though "passing" isn't the end of Yanyun's tale. We'll always remember: never abandon ideals against the wind, and keep improving under scrutiny.

We're even more grateful to walk this path with you, shaping Yanyun's story together. It's you and "Yanyun Sixteen Tones" who've built today's Jianghu. Deeply moved, we dare not forget.

All of Sixteen Lanes hereby offer a #4d734dtoken of gratitude#E. Let this also be a pledge: on the long road ahead, urge us to honor the #Ygreenhorn's vow#E—hold true to our初心, fear no path, train hard, for martial arts know no bounds!

May we share Jianghu's splendor, ride side by side through endless lands.

When you first clear any path trial chapter, you can obtain the first clearance reward. This part of the reward cannot be obtained repeatedly when the path trial is reset. 
For each comprehension objective achieved in the path trial, you can obtain 10 Uncut Jades and earn one star on the star reward screen, which can be obtained repeatedly when the path trial is reset. 
On the star reward screen, when earned stars reach the specified level, you can claim a corresponding star reward. When the path trial is reset, this part of the reward will be reset. 
Uncut Jade can be used to exchange for rewards in the path trial shop. There is an upper limit of the obtainable Uncut Jade in each path trial challenge period, with a maximum of 600 obtainable. 
When all comprehension objectives of any path trial chapter are completed, you can obtain a time-limited badge and title. When the path trial is reset, you need to challenge again to obtain them.

1. This game is a high-freedom Wuxia MMORPG (Massively Online Role-Playing Game) intended for users aged 18 and above. It is recommended that minors play under parental supervision.

2. The game is set in a fictional era inspired by the early Song Dynasty, clearly distinct from real-life events. The gameplay features physical controls and puzzle-solving, with both cooperative and competitive Online Modes. Players are encouraged to communicate and challenge themselves. A social system supporting text and voice interactions is available and subject to relevant laws and regulations.

3. This game has a real-name verification system. Verified minor users are subject to the following restrictions:Some gameplay features and items require payment. Users under 8 years old are not permitted to make purchases. Users aged 8 to 15 may not spend more than 50 CNY per transaction and 200 CNY per month. Users aged 16 to 17 may not spend more than 100 CNY per transaction and 400 CNY per month.

Accounts without real-name verification cannot log in. Verified minors may log in only between 20:00–21:00 on Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays, and official holidays. Access is restricted at all other times.

4. The game blends traditional Chinese culture with the Wuxia world, incorporating rich cultural elements into its visual design, soundtrack, and narrative, which is conducive to disseminating traditional Chinese culture. Cooperative gameplay encourages communication, teamwork, and emotional engagement. Helping each other complete Quests fosters collaboration and team spirit among players.

To my best friend,
Happy New Year.
I wish you prosperity everywhere, happiness always, sweet dreams every night, and success year after year... Haha, pretty impressive, right? Don't worry, there's more.

"Rivers flow beyond Heaven and Earth; mountain hues blur between presence and absence." Sun Yuan once witnessed the "Three-Hundred-Mile Scenery of Jialing River." Inspired, he climbed high, feeling an overwhelming exhilaration. Wielding his fan like a brush, it seemed as though Qing Shan itself guided his strokes—unstoppable as cascading landscapes. Yet, upon regaining composure, he could never replicate those movements. A decade later, the chime of cloud bells stirred his memory, and Verdant Brushstroke reemerged in the Jianghu.

Creating tools to serve all under heaven. This is the way.

#HExpert#E: Combat is highly challenging! Ideal for players seeking a tough challenge. No extra Deflection Assist is provided.

Since taking over Mercyheart Monastery, Huiyao has allied with all manner of outlaws. These people joined the monastery under the guise of monks, but in reality, they lived as bandits and called themselves "ascetic monks." Huiyong stood out among them for his strength and daring, styling himself the "Buddha of Rebirth." As second-in-command, he was based in Buddha Fort, leading raids and robbing commoners. Not long ago, for reasons unknown, Buddha Fort broke ties with Mercyheart Monastery, and under Huiyong's leadership, the ascetic monks have been stirring up trouble... After a wanderer wiped out Huiyong and his followers, the temple lay abandoned for a while. Recently, a few ascetic monks have resurfaced, though in much smaller numbers.

In the battle against the Khitan, Zhu Yousheng led countless youths, fighting bravely against the enemy. However, most of the group was illiterate and couldn't protect themselves. In the face of danger, he had a brainwave: he adapted the Martial Arts of the Ghost Valley, combining the Five Animals Play and the Seven Plays, to create the Nine Mortal Ways. He knew the ways of the mortal, having wandered through life with no support and no expectations. Before he died, he left a message, "Even a drop in the ocean can wander joyfully through the mundane world."

The Jade Book states, "Fierce and brave." Biao describes a swift-moving horse with small spots scattered through its coat. Southwestern Short-legs bearing this pattern are called Chibiao.\nHuayang Chorography, Records of the Southern Regions, notes, "Elders say a divine steed once emerges from Dianchi Lake. When bred, it sires swift horses, known as'Dianchi Foals', said to run five hundred Li a day." During the Tang and Song Dynasties, the Records of the Man People further records, "Horses come from the eastern foot of Mount Yuetan… high-tailed and swift, they run hundreds of Li daily… Tengchong and Shendan also produce horses, second to Yuetan, with Dianchi being the finest." The New Book of Tang, Biography of Nanzhao Clan, likewise says, "West of Yuetan lies lush grass, where fine horses are bred, known as the 'Yuetan Steeds.' Born like lambs, raised on fine grass and rice water, they are rideable by seven years and run hundreds of Li per day." These Dian Horses, so named for their origin near Dianchi Lake, are the Southwestern Pony.\nSmall in stature, with fine limbs, short necks, broad foreheads, and firm, compact hooves, Southwestern Ponies are prized for endurance. Suited for riding, dragging, or carrying loads, they are the most common breed in the southwest.

Early symptoms are headache, low-grade fever, tiredness, and loss of appetite. Even after a bite or scratch has healed, you might feel pain, numbness, or tingling where you were hurt. Within two to three days, the person can become restless and easily agitated, and may develop a fear of water, wind, or bright light. Just seeing or feeling these things can trigger throat spasms or even full-body convulsions. In the final stage, the patient often becomes calm and the spasms stop, but serious problems set in—paralysis, weak muscles, lost reflexes, dilated pupils, trouble breathing, and heart failure. This phase is extremely dangerous and usually ends in death from respiratory failure within about eight days.

In the final stage, the patient often becomes calm and the spasms stop, but serious problems set in—paralysis, weak muscles, lost reflexes, dilated pupils, trouble breathing, and heart failure. This phase is extremely dangerous and usually ends in death from respiratory failure within about eight days.

February 5th 
Sniff... Dad... The Unbound Cavern killed Grandpa. Now they've taken you too... I miss you so much... I swear I'll make them pay! 
If I can learn the first clan master's true form of the Evil Shade, I can beat them! 

March 13th 
Mom says the “true form of the Evil Shade” has been lost to time and that there's no way it can come back. But I don't believe it! I'm going to find it. 
Xiaoxiao says clan Chief Zhu Zhu's scroll has records of it. I have to check it out tomorrow at the disciples' residence. 

April 10th 
I found the scroll! It really has records of the Evil Shade's true form. But Uncle Ren won't even talk to me... 
He said that I'm not a Nine Mortal Ways disciple, so I can't look at it. Even Grannie Yin wouldn't tell me more...

During the reign of Emperor Shizong, Buddhism flourished to such an extent that there were thirty thousand temples and one hundred thousand bronze buddha statues. Nowhere was this devotion more fanatical than in Thousand-Buddha Village near Qinghe. When Miaoshan, a wandering monk, came here and proclaimed outside the village that their faith was hypocrisy, urging them to repent, the villagers drove him away. But after Miaoshan left, heavenly fire suddenly descended, engulfing the entire village in flames. Not a single house was spared. \nSince then, the area has remained scorched earth, lifeless. On quiet midnight hours, people often hear wailing cries from the ruins of Thousand-Buddha Village—perhaps the restless spirits of the villagers, unable to find peace.
Willows sweep the clouds, flowers dance with moon.\nSilk strings mark the years, a traveler worn by June.\nThrough hills and streams and mists, all fades too soon.

By decree of the Ghostlight Market, all merchants must leave by the fourth watch. None may linger until dawn. Yet one wine peddler, drunk as usual, passes out in the street and fails to leave in time. As he drifts between sleep and waking, a distant Gong suddenly rings out. Fog sweeps across the sky, and wraiths wander silently through the mist. Terrified, he flees in a daze, glimpsing flashes of past glory and perhaps the land of the dead. In his panic, he stumbles into the waters of Huang Quan. Flailing helplessly, he grasps the bulb of a red spider lily growing by the riverbank. Moments later, an icy chill spreads through his body. His senses return, and the illusions vanish. When the fog clears and he awakes, he understands its mystery: wine brewed from the flower's stamen causes hallucinations; wine brewed from its bulb chills the heart and wipes away memories. Thus, the second drink, Oblivion Crossing, is born.

Environmental Rules:
Guided by circumstance, drawing closer to nature. 
Certain items can only be crafted in specific environments. Environmental Rules in the Jianghu: 
1. Environments are categorized into Temperature, Humidity, and Wind—each favoring different types of crafting. 
2. Each environmental type has varying tiers. Higher-tier items require higher-tier environments. 
Environments may persist naturally as geomantic hotspots or shift with weather conditions. 
Players can temporarily alter environments using Survival Martial Arts.

The Book of Han notes, "The name Zhui is for fine horses." Zhui indicates a coat mottled with pale and dark colors. Southwestern Short-legs with this marking are called Chizhui.\nHuayang Chorography, Records of the Southern Regions, notes, "Elders say a divine steed once emerges from Dianchi Lake. When bred, it sires swift horses, known as'Dianchi Foals', said to run five hundred Li a day." During the Tang and Song Dynasties, the Records of the Man People further records, "Horses come from the eastern foot of Mount Yuetan… high-tailed and swift, they run hundreds of Li daily… Tengchong and Shendan also produce horses, second to Yuetan, with Dianchi being the finest." The New Book of Tang, Biography of Nanzhao Clan, likewise says, "West of Yuetan lies lush grass, where fine horses are bred, known as the 'Yuetan Steeds.' Born like lambs, raised on fine grass and rice water, they are rideable by seven years and run hundreds of Li per day." These Dian Horses, so named for their origin near Dianchi Lake, are the Southwestern Pony.\nSmall in stature, with fine limbs, short necks, broad foreheads, and firm, compact hooves, Southwestern Ponies are prized for endurance. Suited for riding, dragging, or carrying loads, they are the most common breed in the southwest.

Despite his frail health, he shielded countless innocent lives across the city. \nWhen peace finally returned under heaven, he vanished beyond the Ghost Gate, becoming but a lone soul beneath the earth.

1. Level Breakthrough 
When the breakthrough conditions are met, you can perform a level breakthrough, and #Hyou can obtain a precious reward after each breakthrough#E. 

2. Level Impact 
As the solo mode level increases, #Hthe character level cap will also increase#E. Correspondingly, the level of some areas in the open world will increase, making the enemies stronger. The rewards obtained will also increase, including: #Hwild beasts, wild and outpost enemy strength and rewards for defeating them#E. 

3. Level Adjustment 
You can adjust the mode level. This includes level rollback and recovery, which will correspondingly adjust the difficulty and rewards of related gameplay. You can only roll back one level at most. #HWithin 24 hours after level adjustment, you cannot adjust again#E. Level adjustment will not affect the character level cap.

There are three steps to opening the chest. Please follow them carefully. 
Step One: shout loudly, "Nine Mortal Ways are all scoundrels!" Then find the #Ywine flask#E mechanism. 
Step Two: shout loudly, "Nine Mortal Ways are all scoundrels!" Then going in order from #Yleft to front#E, #Ycenter to left#E, and #Yright to back#E, open it. 
Step Three: shout loudly, "Nine Mortal Ways are all scoundrels!" And then retrieve the money and close the chest. 
When traveling the jianghu, put faith above all. Do not leave out a single one of these three steps!

Also known as "striking pole" or "battering pole," the paddle pole was a vital naval weapon during the era of cold weaponry in ancient China. Typically over ten zhang (30 meters) in length, it carried heavy stones, spiked boards, or incendiary materials at the end. In battle, the pole would be swung downward to hurl or smash the payload at enemy vessels, dealing immense damage.

Using Deflection consumes Endurance. Successful Executions restore Endurance.

Most skills can be countered with Deflection. Piercing Mystic Arts will not be countered with Deflection and is even more effective when striking targets who are Defending or Deflecting, but it can be interrupted by any skill.

Various skills, including Mystic Arts and Charged Skills, can interrupt Light or Heavy Attacks, but not vice versa.

Lesson 1: You (Have) and Mao (Have Not) 
Mao: The opposite of you, meaning "to not have" or "there is not." 
Scene Dialogue A 
Elder Brother Zhao: I got a dapper little brother—when he combs his hair, he loves to wa (scoop) pomade and smear it on his head... 
Second Brother Zhao: I mao (don't have) no such brother. 
Elder Brother Zhao: Okay, okay, enough said. 

Scene Dialogue B 
Sweet Xiang: Have you fed Caicai yet? 
Joyful Ni'er: Mao (Nope). Black Egg'll scrounge up food for it. 

Critical Thinking Question: Does Second Brother Zhao have Elder Brother Zhao as a brother?

Participate in the  5v5 Arena to make friends through martial arts. In this 5v5 competitive mode, players can form teams of five to engage in strategic battles.
 5v5 Arena is open every Friday to Sunday, with entry available from 19:45 to 20:00. Be sure to join in on time. Once the match begins, up to four teams with similar ranking points will be grouped into a round-robin bracket. Each group will play three matches, with each match using a best-of-three format. Teams that win a match will earn season points and Activity Points.

In this mode, healing effects are reduced by 70%. After a certain time in battle, players will deal increased damage while healing effectiveness is further reduced. Using the "Deflection" skill consumes Endurance, but successfully executing a finisher restores it.

Most player skills can be countered using "Deflection." However, Armor-Piercing Mystic Arts can't be blocked this way and are especially effective against defensive targets or those using "Deflection"—though they can be interrupted by any skill.

Various player skills (including Mystic Arts and Charged Skills) can interrupt light and heavy attacks, but not the other way around.

Mastering crowd-control removal skills can turn the tide of battle when at a disadvantage.
Gain one stack of Last Stand for every 8% HP lost, max 5 stacks.

But the debts of blood spilled yesterday—will anyone pay them today?

Young Master, how are you this New Year? This is the #8c5823Wound Healing Medicine#E your master entrusted me to deliver before leaving. He mentioned that Madam Han had already prepared this year's lucky charm for you six months ago. At that time, she even wrote you a letter in advance, which I've transcribed below.
Madam Han's letter reads:
The lucky charm is ready for our esteemed guest. I wonder when you plan to return home today? You're a year older now—be more sensible and stop talking about fighting and killing in the Jianghu. What's so great about the Jianghu? You'll only end up getting hurt!
Ah, never mind.
I've made Ultimate Stuffed Fish. When you come back for dinner, remember to bring a jar of Parting Tears—the one you hid under the pear tree behind my back.

The Essentials of Strategy, printed in the 46th year of the Kangxi reign, stands as one of the four surviving endgame treatises of Qing dynasty. This work gathered numerous folk-endorsed martial endgames and marked a significant shift from the preference for red victories in endgames in the Ming dynasty, instead embracing draws—a turning point that paved the way for more sophisticated endgame theory.

In the twelfth month of the third year of the Qianyou era
After Governor Guo entered the city, Kaifeng fell into chaos. Brother Shen Yiren led our group, soldiers and their families, into the mountains to escape arrest. He Er shouted the loudest, refusing to let go of his newly gained wealth and clamoring to charge back into the city. I knew this disaster would be hard to survive, but I only wished for everyone's safety.

In the first month of the fourth year of the Qianyou era
The chaos sparked a severe famine. Starving corpses littered the land. If the city was this dire, what of the freezing mountains? Feibao and Tiemeng could barely hold their swords. He Er had long stopped shouting, the way he stared at women and children was terrifying.
If we don't find food, we'll all die. We won't need enemies to destroy us, we'll perish on our own!

In the second month of the fourth year of the Qianyou era
The Zheng family did have leftover grain!
He Er had already charged in with Brother, but how could we trade innocent lives for our own…? I refused to go until I saw Brother Bingjie's daughter. The baby had starved to death just days after birth. Bingjie's wife, skeletal and with swollen legs, refused to accept it, clinging to the child and whispering: "Xixi, be good. Hold on a little longer, you'll have rice soup soon."
Looking at Xixi's dying older sister, I clenched my spear.

In the third month of the fourth year of the Qianyou era
Bingjie secretly spared a survivor! Besides the Zheng family rescued by Silver Needle swordsman, there was a month-old baby girl he hid. When I saw Bingjie's wife feeding her rice soup and calling her "Xixi", I understood why.
I helped them hide her from He Er. This child must survive, she has to.
...
...

In the first month of the first year of the Xiande era
Toxic mushrooms now blanket North Mountain.
Villagers whisper about the Lady Zheng's drowning herself after the poisoning. Shen Yilun agonizes most, he blamed himself for her suffering, unable to accept this end.
I silenced his wails. Not because he was wrong... but because ... He Er wants him dead. With Elder Brother gone, "sworn brotherhood" won't protect him long.

In the second month of the first year of the Xiande era
Shen Yilun has disappeared!
The village is in panic. Just days ago, He Er planned to expel all the elderly, weak, and defiant to cope with the worsening poison and famine!
He even wanted to drive out Bingzhong and Bingjie's wives and children, Tiemeng's sister and mother! He asked me for the other half of the main house key, wanting to retrieve armor and return to banditry!
I should never have tolerated him this long. Never.

In the sixth month of the first year of the Xiande era
Peace has finally come.
After He Yuezhi was forced to flee, I made three vows with the remaining villagers, no more banditry, no more abandoning the weak, and a commitment to farming and peaceful living.
I locked the other half of the main house key under the well. Maybe one day I'll confess everything to Zhaoming and the others, and atone for our sins to Xixi and the surviving Zheng family. Perhaps… we'll live to see a world where Ever-Normal for All exists and everyone is free from hunger.
Bring it on.\nUnless you're absolutely certain, this move is best avoided.

My brother's circumstances have changed drastically.

#YThe Sword of Triumph#E: A light sword for horseback combat. In the third year of Guangqi under Emperor Xizong of Tang, the governor of Zhenhai established a personal guard called the “Triumphant Army”. They were stationed in the rear hall, and his son was appointed commander. Their rations and stipends were several times that of the regular troops, who became resentful and grew increasingly unruly outside the compound... 

#YThe Sword of Sovereign#E: A light sword for armored horseback combat. In the third year of Tianyou under Emperor Zhaoxuan of Tang, Zhu Quanzhong was trapped in Cangzhou. Liu Rengong, the governor of Lulong, tried to rescue him but failed. He was conscripted by force and asked the soldiers to bring their own food. In the end, he commanded more than a hundred thousand soldiers, and called himself the Sovereign...

Thirteen years ago, in the Dingwei year, during a time of chaos, the Khitan army invaded Kaifeng, unleashing fire and slaughter. The people rose to defend their homes, and after a month of bitter fighting, the invaders were repelled. As the city rebuilt, an old tree in the northwest was found scorched by the fires of war, yet miraculously sprouting new leaves. Seeing it as a divine sign of resilience, the people named it the Immortal Tree.



Later, when the usurper Liu Zhiyuan founded his short-lived Han dynasty, his sycophantic court seized upon this story. Claiming the tree as a heavenly omen, they forcibly expelled the local residents and built the Garden of Auspicious Omen, adorning its burnt branches with paper flowers to flatter their emperor.



And yet, what came of it? The Liu Han dynasty collapsed in just two generations. A dynasty's fate is not bound to trinkets and omens. How can a ruler in troubled times dare to cast aside caution for arrogance?



Now, in the first year of Jianlong, with the founding of the Great Song, the realm remains divided. Our Emperor, taking this tale of hubris as a solemn warning, has decreed that the garden be remade. It is renamed the Garden of Vigilance and returned to the people, a testament to his vow to rule with virtue, to remain ever-cautious, and to protect the nation and its people.



Decreed and erected in the seventh month of the first year of the Jianlong era

A stone tablet erected in front of the Kaifeng Prefecture during the Song Dynasty, this stone tablet records the names and terms of service of Governors of Kaifeng Prefecture. It begins with Zan Jurun in the first year of Jianlong and ends with Li Xiaoshou in the fourth year of Chongning, listing a total of 183 names. At the time of the third year of Jianlong, only Zan Jurun and Zhao Guangyi the King of Jin had their names inscribed.

Oat Meal, a humble yet time-honored dish, traces its origins back to the Han Dynasty. In The Rapid Primer by Shi You of the Western Han, there is a line: "Flatbreads, wheatmeal rice, and sweet bean soup." Centuries later, the poet Lu You wrote: "A clay pot of wheatmeal shared with the old neighbor," and "In festive times, every household is filled with its rich aroma." By the Northern Song period, wheatmeal rice had become a daily staple for the people. Sprinkled with tender acacia buds and wild chives, the green and yellow hues made it visually enticing. Though its rough texture—thanks to the wheat bran—left a lasting impression, the bran helped stave off hunger, and the wild greens provided essential nutrition. For those living near the Forsaken Quarter, it was a rare and treasured meal.

To the Venerable Master,
I humbly extend my highest respects and hope this letter finds you well.
Since our parting, I journeyed north with a merchant caravan and have now taken up study at the Inkbound Order. Through Master Wei's benevolence, I have mastered the Art of Yin and Yang. The memory of that tragedy in the desolate village still weighs heavily upon me, and my chronic ailment shows little sign of abating. Only this single scroll, with its teachings on harmonizing Yin and Yang. may yet restore balance to the body. I implore you, honored elder, to accept it without hesitation or misgivings. Pray, do take great care of yourself. Words cannot capture all I feel; please forgive this humble letter.
With profound respect and unwavering devotion,
Your humble disciple,
Ying
Written before Your Grace on the tenth day of the third month.

This Tang Dynasty manuscript score titled Jieshi Tune - Solitary Orchid (Vol. 5), traditionally attributed to Confucius and transmitted by the Liang Dynasty hermit Qiu Ming, stands as the oldest surviving score in existence. The piece is divided into four sections, conveying through its portrayal of the orchid's noble character a sentiment of remaining undefeated in spirit despite unrecognized talent. The score preserves the early character-based notation system, comprising 224 lines (with 20-24 characters per line) and totaling 4,954 characters. Currently housed at the Tokyo National Museum under No. TB1393.

Those three little rascals—Fu, Lu, and Shou—can't read or write, but they insisted on sending you a letter. So, this old man will be writing it for them. Whatever they said, I wrote, so don't mind the rambling.

Fu: Old Shan, write this: Big Guy, after we parted ways at the Furnace, we were all really worried about you.

Shou: Don't write that! I wasn't worried about that big dumb-dumb at all!

Fu: But you were! You were running in circles so fast, Fu-Fu's eyes got dizzy!

Shou: No, I wasn't! You remembered wrong, dummy Fu-Fu!

Lu: Stop arguing! Weren't we going to tell $T(2001) about the treasure? Old Shan, write this: we were worried, so we snuck back into the Furnace to find you. But turns out you're so strong, you'd already fought your way out! We picked up some treasures along the way. Since these are no use to us, we all agreed they should go to you.

Shou: I never said to give them to $T(30)!

Lu: Fine, fine! You didn't say this, it was me and Fu-Fu.

Shou: Then don't make it sound like just you two decided!

Fu: Oh! I understand! A'Shou's being… um… donkey lips and horse mouth?

Lu: Don't you mean saying one thing but meaning another?

Shou: Little Fu, did you just call me a donkey?!

Fu: I-I-I did not! Why would you think you're a donkey?!

...

Sigh. Now Little Fu and Little Shou are fighting, Little Lu's trying to break it up,
and this old man's head is spinning from the noise. Who knows when they'll stop.

Anyway, I won't wait on them anymore.
Wanderer, when you have time, come by the old man's "Sepulchral Curios" shop in the Ghost Market. You can pick up the treasures they brought back from the Buried Tomes.

When using Strategic Sword, during the recovery phase of Martial Skills, Special Skills, and Charged Skills, pressing the button again at the perfect timing allows you to perform #YUnrestricted Sword#E to pursue the enemy. If the target is under #Y5#E stacks of Bleed, it clears all Bleed and immediately deals a high amount of Bleed damage. Each successful cast of #CUnrestricted Sword#E restores #Y8#E Stamina. Each time you deal high amount Bleed damage, you accumulate #CUnrestricted Sword Intent#E for yourself. When full, the next #CUnrestricted Sword#E is guaranteed to be a Comprehension hit. When Unrestricted Sword Intent is not empty, high amount Bleed damage dealt is additionally increased by #Y15%#E, and additionally retains #Y2#E stacks of Bleed. When Unrestricted Sword Intent is full and triggers the next Comprehension hit with Unrestricted Sword, #Y20#E points of Unrestricted Sword Intent are retained.

3v3 Arena is a 3v3 Fair Competitive Mode. During competitions, all young wanderers will have their Combat Attributes normalized (character Attributes, Gear Sets, Tuning, and Attuning effects are disabled; Mystic Arts are fixed at Stage 0, Tier 1 and Internal Arts at Tier 1). Wanders can queue solo or as a pre-made team of three. In this mode, reviving teammates is not possible, and healing effects are reduced by 70%. After a short duration in battle, damage dealt increases, while healing is further weakened.

In Arena of Arms mode, teammates cannot be revived, and healing effects are reduced by 70%. After a period in combat, damage dealt increases while healing becomes less effective.

Using Deflection consumes Endurance. Successful Executions restore Endurance.

Most skills can be countered with Deflection. Piercing Mystic Arts will not be countered with Deflection and even more effective when striking targets who are Defending or Deflecting, but it can be interrupted by any skill.

Various skills, including Mystic Arts and Charged Skills, can interrupt Light or Heavy Attacks, but not vice versa.

Use Control-breaking Skills to turn the tide. In 3v3 Arena, defeating opponents grants Arms Points. Those with the highest points will be ranked on the Leaderboard.

Crucian carp travel in groups, always staying close to one another. \n\nCrucian carp were domesticated in China over a thousand years ago. Later, a golden variant emerged, becoming the ancestor of today's goldfish and eventually forming a distinct breed. Accounts of Strange Things records: "Goldfish have been kept since the Song, now they are found in households everywhere for amusement." However, breeding golden crucian carp was once a secret art. It was rumored that feeding them a certain small red worm would gradually brighten their color. It wasn't until the Ming and Qing dynasties that breeding techniques became more advanced and standardized.

Among these eighty-eight Buddhas, fifty-three are drawn from the Sutra of the Two Bodhisattvas, Medicine King and Superior Medicine, and are Buddhas of the past in the Saha world. The remaining thirty-five are from the Vinaya of Certainty, representing present Buddhas across the ten realms. All eighty-eight Buddhas serve as guides of repentance for sentient beings. Thus, reciting The Great Repentance Text can purify even the gravest transgressions and lead one to sincere remorse.

Devout souls from every corner have gathered here by the hand of fate, their meetings and partings woven by the gentle grace of the Buddha. 
United in faith, the devoted collectively cultivate virtues, each humble act etched eternally with your honored names. 
The Buddha's radiance shines like a treasure trove of light, as good deeds quietly amass; the soft murmurs of sutra chanting linger like a timeless melody of compassion. 
This book of merit is lovingly inscribed with the wish that each of you may forever keep a heart radiant and pure, and carry the flame of boundless kindness throughout your days. 

The young hero's noble deeds are forever captured in timeless art, his illustrious name destined to bloom in the hearts of generations—a fame that shall never fade.

This musical score was lost in China but survives by name and anecdote in ancient texts. According to the Old Book of Tang: Treatise on Music and Extensive Records of the Taiping Era, the piece originated after Emperor Taizong defeated the rebel warlord Liu Wuzhou. The people of Hedong celebrated in the streets with song and dance. Soldiers adapted older military tunes with new lyrics to commemorate the victory, and thus the piece "The King of Qin Crushes the Enemies" was born, later entered the repertoire of the imperial music bureau. In the early Zhenguan era, Emperor Taizong ordered Wei Zheng and others to revise the lyrics, while Lu Cai arranged the melodies and harmonized the composition. The finalized work became known as The King of Qin in Battle. \nSeveral variants of the song survive in ancient Japanese Tang-music collections. Among them, the earliest version appears in the Five-String Score, believed to be a Japanese transcription of original Tang court music. This version, regarded as closest to the original, is currently preserved in the Yōmei Bunko in Tokyo.

Its leaves are fan-shaped, with veins radiating out into the leaf blade, and lean and green in different shades on both sides. Blossoming in February, its jade-colored clusters appear just before midnight and fall soon after; people rarely get to see its flowers.

Unlock all #YEpic rewards in the current prize pool to proceed to the next one for Dream Tracing.#E Each reward in a pool has a maximum obtainable limit. Once reached, that reward can no longer be obtained, and its probability is dynamically redistributed to other rewards. Check the details for current probabilities and remaining reward quantities. After the event ends, Jade Hearts will be systematically converted at a rate of 16:1 into Ethereal Note - Bound. Any remaining Jade Hearts less than 16 will be converted into Echo Jade at a 1:10 ratio.

Battle and Social Data: After the body swap, the following information remains unchanged: Level, Attributes, Abilities, Internal Art, Profession, Sect, Guild, Social relationships, etc.
Gallery of Faces & Style Showcase: Uploaded Gallery  data will be preserved. Personal Style Showcase will preserve the corresponding outfit and pose based on the selected appearance.
Outfit Presets: Presets from your original body type will be saved. However, after your body swap, outfit presets will not carry over and must be rearranged.
Appearance & Account Data: Upon the body swap, your character's model, voice, and other visuals will automatically adjust to match the new body type (you will be granted one chance to customize your face). All unlocked hero titles, explorations, and story quests will remain unchanged.
Non-wearable Cosmetic Items: Items not tied to body types (such as weapons, martial arts effects, mounts, and ornaments) are unaffected by the swap.
Preserve Data of the Original Body Type: After the body swap, your character's previous body type data will be preserved. If you swap back in the future, you can reuse the original appearance settings.
One-Time Reset Within 7 Days: You can undo the swap for free within 7 days after the first body swap. Resetting will not refund the item Yin Yang Morphing Pill, and any unused limited-time dye items will be reclaimed.
After the body swap, a private message will be sent to your friends to notify them of your new body type.

Dear Wanderer,

As spring's chill lingers, we greet you with respect.

A wind stirs through the Bamboo Abode, with sword in hand, one steps into the world. Since the Young Master left the Bamboo Grove Abode, over #8c582,330 million Wanderers#E have set foot on the Jianghu Journey, crossing fates amidst these rivers and mountains.

From the verdant hills of Qinghe to the bustling streets of Kaifeng, the Young Master has shed youthful naivety and begun to walk the true path of a warrior. So too has Yanyun grown alongside every Wanderer, refining every detail, striving to offer a better journey. This grand encounter we now share is thanks to your continuous support and patience. The road in the Jianghu is a difficult one to walk, yet our hearts remain sincere, and our fists, unwavering. All of us at Sixteen Lanes will continue to listen to your guidance and critique, repaying your trust with our utmost devotion. To show our gratitude, we offer #4d734da gift#E, a small gesture to express our heartfelt appreciation.

Here's to our meeting in the bamboo grove. To strong wine that drowns all burdens of the heart. To the Wanderers who ride side by side toward distant horizons, youthful spirit, ever the same.

The world is vast and boundless, we journey onward with you.

"Report! Hall Master, three hundred sixty-two answered roll call today. Three fewer than yesterday!"
"Report! Hall Master, we have sixty-two sacks of grain left. Enough for sixteen more days!"
"Report—"
Feng Ruzhi flips through the pages in front of him, and pauses over yet another disheartening letter. He merely nods; not because he doesn't care, but because he's grown used to it all: first the daily toll of bad news, then cooking over a mud stove with no rice or flour, and finally, swallowing whatever the world throws at him, taking calamity as routine.
The people who live by the Yellow River seem born to endure. Born to bend, so the ropes bite deep into the shoulders that carry them. Born to face the earth, so their backs hunch low like staples hammered into the dam.
But there are things they never learn to live with: Holding their own bowls while still begging the sky for rain. Jumping into the river and expecting it to wash away blame. Standing tall, only for the world to break their backs. Every act of endurance is just waiting for a moment they stop enduring. The moment they defy the heavens, and refuse to kneel.
"Report! Hall Master! There's word from Baima Station. Boss Feng is coming back!"
"... Got it."

...Day...Month, Second Year of the Xiande Era
Master Miaoshan defended his thesis before the throne and was honored as the Enlightened One, entrusted with the Fahua Temple. This temple stands near Mercyheart Town, and with the Enlightened One's protection, the town's Buddha statue trade should remain untouched by the anti-buddist movement.
Our devotion will surely be known to the Buddha. Let us carve statues in peace....

...Day...Month, Third Year of the Xiande Era
My worthless son, Yixian, idles all day, lazy and unambitious. It seems the Yang family's Buddha-carving heritage will die with me. Lately, fewer merchant ships come to town for statues… perhaps it's time to change trades. Ah, never mind. Kids must find their own way....

...Day...Month, Sixth Year of the Xiande Era
Two years of dwindling earnings. The town grows uneasy. A'huai and others mutter about demanding answers from the Enlightened One. But the purge decree comes from the court. What can he do?...

...Day...Month, Sixth Year of the Xiande Era
A letter from the Enlightened One summoned me to the Pagoda of Karma at the Bodhi Sea to cleave stone. Only upon arrival did I learn the task, to split a rare jade boulder. Within its depths, the shadow of a Buddha faintly gleamed. Such jade ought to be polished and treasured, yet he ordered it halved. What waste... The stone resists all tools; I must work carefully....

...Day...Month, Sixth Year of the Xiande Era
The evening drum… why does it sound at noon? And from the Pagoda's direction. Could the master...? No, I must check it out.(The record ends abruptly here.)

Exercise 1: Disciples from Nine Mortal Ways and Lone Cloud are gambling with dice at the market.
Each uses two regular dice (numbers 1–6). If their sums are equal, it's a tie. What's the probability of a tie?
Answer: 1 in 36. Why? The clever Nine Mortal Ways disciple brings two dice that always roll 6, totaling 12, while the Lone Cloud disciple rolls honestly, getting any sum from 2 to 12. Out of 36 possible combinations, only double sixes from Lone Cloud Disciples can tie, so 1/36.

Exercise 2: During tea season, Velvet Shade hosts daily tea tastings. Each day, guests are served one of three teas at Revelry Hall: Jing Mountain, Qujiang Thin Slice, or Xianya Stone Flower.
The chances are: 40% for Jing Mountain, 30% each for Qujiang Thin Slice and Xianya Stone Flower. So, how many days, on average, would it take for a guest to taste all three?
Answer: Simple calculation shows it's about 5.6 days. But, of course, you could always sneak into the kitchen of Revelry Hall and try them all in one go.

A stone tablet erected in front of the Kaifeng Prefecture during the Song Dynasty, this stone tablet records the names and terms of service of Governors of Kaifeng Prefecture. It begins with Zan Jurun in the first year of Jianlong and ends with Li Xiaoshou in the fourth year of Chongning, listing a total of 183 names. At the time of the third year of Jianlong, only Zan Jurun and Zhao Guangyi the King of Jin had their names inscribed.

In Shi Family Village, there were those called Flood Watchers. At Roaring Sands, there stood a drum, the Heavenly Sound Drum.
A scar ran across its surface, a wound dating back to the year 960.
That year, the Yellow River raged. The villagers beat the drum until it split, yet the Flood Watcher who should have returned with aid never came.
First, the drumming shook the skies, growing ever louder.
Then, the wails of broken families and children's screams wove into the rhythm, until the drum could no longer drown the crying.
Finally, the weeping stopped. The drumming stopped. The weepers died. The drum shattered.

The man the drum failed to summon was Shi Shouxin.

The very moment the Heavenly Sound Drum shattered, his new lord donned the yellow robe of emperorship and was escorted into Kaifeng. The ceremonial procession of the returning army was so thunderous that perhaps he truly could not hear the pleading drumrolls from his hometown.
He was no longer the Flood Watcher. He became Deputy Commander of the Imperial Guard Cavalry and Infantry, then later Minister of Equal Rank, then Commander of the Imperial Guard Cavalry and Infantry.
The villagers of Shi Family Village could not remember these grand titles. In their eyes, his identity had never changed.
As he passed by his parents' home, they spat and said, "Our humble village can't hold a general like you. The old Shitou? He's dead!"
The broken scar on the drumhead was like the breaking of his spine. He was known as a traitor, a man who climbed to power over the bones of relatives and friends, one of the killers of Zhu Yu. The blood and tears that had gone unheard dried into a chasm of hatred.

Shi Shouxin never returned to Shi Family Village.
No one knows if, when he stood in the imperial court and saw a winding river churning white waves, or read reports of floods in official documents, he would remember the cracked drum. Did the roar of the flood ever fade in his ears, or did it never truly stop?

Property Division Contract of the Zhou Family, Qinghe Mercyheart Town
We, Zhou Qiyan, along with younger brothers Qishi, Qilei, and Qidang, hereby establish this contract. Our ancestor, Master Zihui, was a skilled stone carver who braved hardships to establish our family business, accumulating considerable wealth. From the sixth year of Kaiyuan to the present day, our craft has been passed down faithfully through sixteen generations without neglect. Yet since the Emperor's ban on Buddhism three years ago, our trade has withered. No work means no food. To secure our livelihoods, we divide all assets to save the single house reserved for our father, Xiuli, in his retirement, into monetary shares. The total value of stone materials, houses, fields, and tools amounts to 176 strings of cash, divided equally into four portions. Zhou Qiyan receives the single house and 26 strings; Zhou Qishi receives 50 strings; Zhou Qilei receives 50 strings; Zhou Qidang receives 50 strings. From this day forth, each shall hold their share without dispute. Should any violate this agreement, the offending party shall be reported to the authorities, and this document shall serve as binding proof. Four identical copies are made, marked Heaven, Earth, Man, and Harmony for each party to keep in perpetuity.
14th Day of the Third Month, Fifth Year of the Xiande Era
Signatories:
Zhou Qiyan (seal)
Zhou Qishi (seal)
Zhou Qilei (seal)
Zhou Qidang (seal)

In the 19th year of the Zhenguan era, the monk Xuanzang returned from India with 520 bundles of Mahayana and Theravada scriptures, comprising 657 texts, spreading Buddhist teachings far and wide. By the 4th year of the Kaiyuan era, the Fahua Temple and Yongfu Temple were established in Qinghe's Sundara Land, housing 75 scriptural collections totaling 1,335 volumes.
Zhuanzhi (fourth son of the patriarch Yang Hui) arrived in Metta Town in Kaiyuan 6th year with disciples including Zhou Zihui, Pan Zigang, and Xie Zhisong. Settling near the Fahua Temple and Yongfu Temple afar, they devoted themselves to Buddhist sculpture. Their early statues of Buddha, Guanyin, and bodhisattvas were technically adept but lifeless. Zhuanzhi declared: "To master Buddhist carving, one must first comprehend Buddhist truth." After intensive scripture study, their later works radiated divine majesty. Stonemason Town, renamed "Mercyheart Town", gained renown, and the Yang, Zhou, Pan, and Xie clans took root. Roots define heritage. A family without records is like a nation without history. This genealogy ensures descendants remember their ancestors' trials.
....
Sons of Patriarch HuizhiYang Changzhi, Yang Weizhi, Yang Minzhi, Yang Zuanzhi
...
Grandsons of Patriarch HuizhiYang Xiyi - Eldest son of Yang Zuanzhi
...
(A dozen pages detailing 17 generations of the Yang lineage follow)
...

Yang Daohuai, Yang Daoxin...
17th-Generation Descendants of HuizhiYang's Son, 
Yang Yilai, Yang the Youngest...

The Jade Book states, "Hualiu, a superior pony." A pure red pony is called Hua. Hualiu is originally a famous pony, one of King Mu of Zhou's Eight Steeds. Later generations use this name for ponies of similar color, making it the most valued among the Southwestern Ponies.\nHuayang Chorography, Records of the Southern Regions, notes, "Elders say a divine steed once emerged from Dianchi Lake. When bred, it sires swift horses, known as'Dianchi Foals,' said to run five hundred Li a day." During the Tang and Song Dynasties, the Records of the Man People further records, "Horses come from the eastern foot of Mount Yuetan… high-tailed and swift, they run hundreds of Li daily… Tengchong and Shendan also produce horses, second to Yuetan, with Dianchi being the finest." The New Book of Tang, Biography of Nanzhao Clan, likewise says, "West of Yuetan lies lush grass, where fine horses are bred, known as the 'Yuetan Steeds.' Born like lambs, raised on fine grass and rice water, they are rideable by seven years and run hundreds of Li per day." These Dian Horses, so named for their origin near Dianchi Lake, are the Southwestern Pony.\nSmall in stature, with fine limbs, short necks, broad foreheads, and firm, compact hooves, Southwestern Ponies are prized for endurance. Suited for riding, dragging, or carrying loads, they are the most common breed in the southwest.

All vessels follow the flesh; all sinews follow the bones. The body contains 365 bones, bound and interwoven in structure. By them, the hands can grasp, the feet can walk—every motion flows from their alignment. But in sudden calamities—falls, crashes, violent twists—injuries may occur beyond prediction. In treatment, minor cases call for reducing swelling and easing spasms, while serious ones require reconnecting sinews and resetting bones. For each, there are time-tested prescriptions.

Also known as "striking pole" or "battering pole," the paddle pole was a vital naval weapon during the era of cold weaponry in ancient China. Typically over ten zhang (30 meters) in length, it carried heavy stones, spiked boards, or incendiary materials at the end. In battle, the pole would be swung downward to hurl or smash the payload at enemy vessels, dealing immense damage.

Every year on the ninth day of September, Silver Needle would be busier than ever. Double Ninth Festival was a day to honor the elders. Brewing chrysanthemum wine, stitching silverberry pouches, offering free medical checkups in the village... So many patients to see, even more chores to do. Whenever the burden of it all seemed too heavy, the younger disciples would turn to a slender figure amidst the flurry. One call of "Senior Sister!" and somehow, everything would fall into place. Soon, the village would echo with cries of "Senior Sister!" one after another.

Listening to those calls, Zhu Yu never grew annoyed. If anything, she felt nostalgic. Memories arose of when her own younger siblings were still alive, calling for her in just the same way. In her memory, the village was always bathed in the light of the Double Ninth. Grandmother was stitching silverberry pouches with nimble fingers, and Grandfather was sipping wine by the fence draped in chrysanthemums. As the sun went down, her little brother and sister would shout to go climbing, rushing toward the hills beyond the village, clutching their spinning pinwheels:

"Big Sister! Let's go climb!"

The dusk sun painted their cheeks red, like two bright silverberries gleaming in the golden light. Zhu Yu had reached out her hand, smiling, taking a step toward them. But the sunlight vanished. Those small, waving hands had long since fallen still, soaked in the cold rain. The golden needle slipped from her hand. The ones she most wanted to save... she could not save after all. Ninth day of September, Double Ninth, her birthday. After that day, no one ever called her "Big Sister" again.

"Senior Sister!" Rubbing her bleary eyes, Zhu Yu realized she had dozed off in the yellow flowers by the fence. A younger disciple, grinning at the sight of her flustered senior, chirped, "Senior Sister, happy birthday!" Year after year, and again it was the Double Ninth.

"Senior Sister, you're so kind! You're just like the big sister I always wanted. Can I call you big sister from now on?"

"That's cheating, Forsythia. Me too!"

"And me! And me!"

Zhu Yu looked at the tiny, jostling figures crowding around her, and smiled.

"...Alright."

November 21st. Raining. Clinic closed. 
November 22nd. Didn't open yesterday, so won't open today either. 
November 23rd. Opened. Treated three patients. 
November 24th. Opened yesterday, so not opening today. 
...... 

The record book of the Evercare Clinic was full of entries like these. Doctor Tian felt no shame about it. In fact, he took pride in the habit. He even claimed to have over a dozen volumes just like it. In earlier years, the excuses had been things like: "Doudou is sick," "Yaoyao is sick," "Doudou is crying"...

"What a shame!" Doctor Tian sighed dramatically, slouching sideways in his chair. It's such a shame those two disciples are all grown up now. As their master, he had no choice but to come up with new excuses.

18th Day, 1st Month, 1st Year of Jianlong 
The winds are calm today. All remains in order. No word from His Majesty. I continue studying the manuals... 

19th Day, 1st Month, 1st Year of Jianlong 
The winds are calm today. All remains in order. No word from His Majesty. I continue studying the manuals... 
20th Day, 1st Month, 1st Year of Jianlong 
Still calm, nothing new. No directives from His Majesty. Still studying... I've read the same three lines for three days now and still can't make sense of them... 

... 

25th Day, 1st Month, 1st Year of Jianlong 
Word is that civil official arrives tomorrow. I hate dealing with those types, but His Majesty seems to favor them lately... No idea what he's coming for. 

26th Day, 1st Month, 1st Year of Jianlong 
Turns out we're being reassigned to Chang'an! What? Why? I don't accept this!

It's important to note that the way chess moves are recorded in this book differs from modern practice. Rather than numbering the ranks from right to left as players do today, moves are listed from left to right, following the reader's perspective. Aside from this distinction, the system for recording moves is much the same as it is now—a testament to how well-established the conventions of chess already were at the time.

1. Wisdom Contest: Wealth Lord has 4 stages: Preliminaries, Group Stage, Semifinals, and Finals. 
2. Preliminaries: Continuous matches with increasing base score and target bronze token requirements. Players failing to meet token thresholds are eliminated each round until 18 remain with top 12 advance. 
3. Group Stage: Tokens from Preliminaries are converted #Ywith a maximum of 2,000#E, followed by 2 consecutive matches at each table. Top 6 will progress. 
4. Semifinals: 2 consecutive matches will be held at the same table, and the top 3 will advance to the next stage. 
5. Finals: 3 consecutive matches determine final rankings.

Third Month, First Year of the Xiande Era
Abstain from all evil, practice all good, and purify the mind. This is the teaching of the Buddhas. Master Miaoshan… (The remaining text has been torn away.)

Fourth Month, First Year of the Xiande Era
Today, during Master's sermon at the Thousand Buddha Pagoda, divine radiance truly descended upon us… (The rest is smudged beyond legibility, with a furious scribble added below: "Sorcery and deception, utterly vile!")

Sixth Month, Second Year of the Xiande Era
"The Master's audience before the Emperor has shaken the realm. The status of Mercyheart Monastery will never be the same. Could he truly be… a Buddha? (The following lines are aggressively overwritten with fresh ink—only broken phrases like "collusion" and "scheming" can be discerned.)

Second Month, First Year of the Jianlong Era
Since the Master left the monastery, not a word has been heard. I fear the worst. Tomorrow, I shall depart to seek him.

Third Month, First Year of the Jianlong Era
Miaoshan—from start to finish, it was all a lie. "Holy monk of the Dharma?" A fraud, bloated on stolen reverence! Had I not uncovered these old letters, I might have died shackled to his deceit. Tian Ying ensnared me with Buddhist platitudes, turning me into his accomplice for years. My life, half-wasted! I will have vengeance.
Now, recalling the "Dharma" that charlatan preached for over a decade, I feel only revulsion. The Twelve Nidānas? Fabrications. The Three Realms and Six Paths? Delusions! From this day forth: All that sings Buddha's praise I defy. All that Buddha abhors I will glorify. Why should clay idols lord over the living? If he could pose as a Bodhisattva… why not I?

Fourth Month, First Year of the Jianlong Era
Even now, fools chant Amitābha and cling to Tian Ying's lies. Disgusting! Fortunately, Huiyong and his bandit-born brethren long despised Tian's faction. Together, we drove those swine out. Now, not a whiff of Buddhism taints Mercyheart Monastery. At last… peace!

2. Energy obtained using non-time-limited #Y[Powder by Pillow]#E before reaching #Y<Lv.10 - Unbond>#E

Early symptoms are headache, low-grade fever, tiredness, and loss of appetite. Even after a bite or scratch has healed, you might feel pain, numbness, or tingling where you were hurt. Within two to three days, the person can become restless and easily agitated, and may develop a fear of water, wind, or bright light. Just seeing or feeling these things can trigger throat spasms or even full-body convulsions. In the final stage, the patient often becomes calm and the spasms stop, but serious problems set in—paralysis, weak muscles, lost reflexes, dilated pupils, trouble breathing, and heart failure. This phase is extremely dangerous and usually ends in death from respiratory failure within about eight days.

All vessels follow the flesh; all sinews follow the bones. The body contains 365 bones, bound and interwoven in structure. By them, the hands can grasp, the feet can walk—every motion flows from their alignment. But in sudden calamities—falls, crashes, violent twists—injuries may occur beyond prediction. In treatment, minor cases call for reducing swelling and easing spasms, while serious ones require reconnecting sinews and resetting bones. For each, there are time-tested prescriptions.

Refer to Pouring out the Cup, the 3rd piece in the Dunhuang Music Score. The Dunhuang Melody Scroll was originally housed in the Sutra Cave of the Mogao Grottoes. Its front side bears the Sermon for the Sacred Festival at the Zhongxing Hall in the Fourth Year of Changxing, while the reverse side contains transcriptions of 25 melody scrolls. Generally believed to be a pipa score, it dates to the late Tang or Five Dynasties period. The notation system used is a semi-symbolic script known as semi-character notation of Yan's Melody, famed for its enigmatic nature, earning it the nickname "the gobbledy-gook of music." The scroll was taken from Dunhuang by French sinologist Paul Pelliot in 1908 and is now held in the Bibliothèque nationale de France, catalogued as P.3808.

Early symptoms are headache, low-grade fever, tiredness, and loss of appetite. Even after a bite or scratch has healed, you might feel pain, numbness, or tingling where you were hurt. Within two to three days, the person can become restless and easily agitated, and may develop a fear of water, wind, or bright light. Just seeing or feeling these things can trigger throat spasms or even full-body convulsions. In the final stage, the patient often becomes calm and the spasms stop, but serious problems set in—paralysis, weak muscles, lost reflexes, dilated pupils, trouble breathing, and heart failure. This phase is extremely dangerous and usually ends in death from respiratory failure within about eight days.

Early symptoms are headache, low-grade fever, tiredness, and loss of appetite. Even after a bite or scratch has healed, you might feel pain, numbness, or tingling where you were hurt. Within two to three days, the person can become restless and easily agitated, and may develop a fear of water, wind, or bright light. Just seeing or feeling these things can trigger throat spasms or even full-body convulsions. In the final stage, the patient often becomes calm and the spasms stop, but serious problems set in—paralysis, weak muscles, lost reflexes, dilated pupils, trouble breathing, and heart failure. This phase is extremely dangerous and usually ends in death from respiratory failure within about eight days.

#YBuy low and sell high#E to turn a big profit!

Prices may rise or fall unpredictably. Once prices #Ydouble#E, this usually means a certain good is in scarce supply.

Dear Wanderer,

In this update, Sixteen Lanes has optimized the gear acquisition experience. After reaching #Y<Level 10 - Unbound>#E in solo mode, each time you claim a reward using Energy, you will now also receive #Y[Gear Echo - Fieryheart]#E. This item can be exchanged in #Y[Season Shop – Gold Gear Exchange]#E for #Y[Lv. 71 Gold Gear Selection Chest]#E, #Y[Lv. 71 Guaranteed Gold Tuning Materials]#E, #Y[Large Tuning Stone - Gold Inlay]#E, and other enhancement resources.

To ensure fairness, Sixteen Lanes will issue #Y[Gear Echo - Fieryheart]#E as compensation based on your Energy consumption prior to this optimization. Related actions include:

1. Energy actually consumed to claim rewards after reaching #Y<Lv.10 - Unbound>#E
2. Energy obtained using non-time-limited #Y[Powder by Pillow]#E before reaching #Y<Lv.10 - Unbound>#E

Note: Due to the large amount of data involved, this round of compensation only includes Energy consumption up to #Y2025February 26th, 05:00#E.

Energy consumed between February 26th 05:00 and February 28th 05:00 will be counted separately and issued later. Please stay tuned for follow-up mail.
